item.title: Getting cozy with WebViews
item.author: contact@atishay.me (Atishay Jain)
item.description: The browser engines as well as the hardware components in smart phones have dramatically improved in the last decade. The web platform has also standardized many APIs required for mobile development. Network bandwidths have had a major uptick. Just like electron in the last 5 years has become the standard way for developing desktop apps, the time is ripe for web technologies to put the strong foot forward in mobile app development.
